itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, March 21, 2014
contentencoded:
It's time for Silicon Tally. How well have you kept up with the week in tech news?

This week's guest is Marketplace's own David Gura. Gura joins us from the Washington, D.C. bureau where he reports on Congress and the White House.
title: Mr. Johnson goes to Washington: This week's Silicon Tally
teaser: Our regular quiz looking back at the week's tech news.
description: Our regular quiz looking back at the week's tech news.
